thread.title: Farmer killed in two-vehicle collision after driving wrong way on motorway
thread.title_full: Farmer killed in two-vehicle collision after driving wrong way on motorway

title: Farmer killed in two-vehicle collision after driving wrong way on motorway
text: Farmer killed in two-vehicle collision after driving wrong way on motorway Independent.ie Gardaí are investigating a fatal two-vehicle collision on the M8 Dublin-Cork motorway when a vehicle did a U-turn at a toll plaza and drove the wrong way along the southbound carriageway. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/farmer-killed-in-twovehicle-collision-after-driving-wrong-way-on-motorway-35331669.html http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/article35331668.ece/08a52/AUTOCROP/h342/2016-12-31_iri_27475549_I1.JPG Emergency services workers at the scene of the crash near Watergrasshill, Co Cork. Photo: Michael Mac Sweeney Gardaí are investigating a fatal two-vehicle collision on the M8 Dublin-Cork motorway when a vehicle did a U-turn at a toll plaza and drove the wrong way along the southbound carriageway. Share Farmer killed in two-vehicle collision after driving wrong way on motorway Independent.ie Gardaí are investigating a fatal two-vehicle collision on the M8 Dublin-Cork motorway when a vehicle did a U-turn at a toll plaza and drove the wrong way along the southbound carriageway. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/farmer-killed-in-twovehicle-collision-after-driving-wrong-way-on-motorway-35331669.html
